name: Boulder Moves, 3D PLATFORM PUZZLER
description:
Adventure through levels and puzzle zones.

Use Dark Sight to discover clues.

Get the boulder to the secret exit...If you can find it!!

Lava, Gusty Geyser's, Spikey Cactus, Mad Mine Carts, springy boards, and much more

4 week group project for the University of Cumbria Institute of Arts
